data.title: Jo Stafford: The Jo Stafford Collection 1939
data.text:
Shipping

KMRIA Records use Royal Mail to send all deliveries. All prices are per Royal Mail set pricing structure.

NOTE: 1 LP weighs approx. 0.23 Kg and 1 Single weighs approx. 0.60kg. 5 LPs therefore, can be sent for under 2KG.

United Kingdom

Singles/7”: £2.52, Signed 2nd Class Royal Mail

LPs and 10”: £4 for up to 2kg and less than £50 – Signed 2nd Class Royal Mail

LPs and 10”: £5.10 for up to 2kg and between £51 and £150 – Tracked 48 Signed

LPS and 10”: £12.00 for up to 2kg and over £150 – Royal Mail Special Delivery

For Packages above 2kg (6 plus records) – £10.95 up to 5kg and 15.95 from 5k to 10k

Delivery is by Parcel Force

Europe

Singles/7” : £8.45, Royal Mail Signed and Tracked

LPs and 10”: £11.50 for up to 2kg and less than £500 – Royal Mail Signed and Tracked

For Packages above 2kg (6 plus records) – £18.75 up to 10kg.

Delivery is by Parcel Force

World Zone 1

United States, Canada, Argentina, Brazil, South Africa, India, China, Japan, Hong Kong, Israel, Oman, United Arab Emirates, Thailand, Vietnam.

Singles/LPs/10”: £14.00 up to 1.5kg and less than £500 – Royal Mail Signed and Tracked

Singles/LPs/10”: £18.00 over 1.5kg and less than 2kg and less than £500 – Royal Mail Signed and Tracked

For Packages above 2kg (6 plus records) – £35 up to 10kg.

Delivery is by Parcel Force

World Zone 2

Australia, New Zealand, Singapore, Fiji.

Singles/LPs/10”: £15.00 up to 1.5kg and less than £500 – Royal Mail Signed and Tracked

Singles/LPs/10”: £21.50 over 1.5kg and less than 2kg and less than £500 – Royal Mail Signed and Tracked

For Packages above 2kg (6 plus records) – £43 up to 10kg.

Delivery is by Parcel Force

Returns and Cancellation Policy

At Record Corner, we are committed to ensuring your satisfaction with every purchase you make. We understand that circumstances may change, and you might need to cancel an order or return a product. Our Returns and Cancellation Policy is designed to provide you with clear guidelines and information on your rights and responsibilities when it comes to cancelling orders and returning goods under the Consumer Contracts (Information, Cancellation & Additional Charges) Regulations. Please take a moment to familiarize yourself with the key points outlined below.

Right to Cancel

Under the Consumer Contracts Regulations, you have the right to cancel your order for goods. This right begins the moment you place your order and lasts for 14 days from the day you receive the goods.

Cancellation Deadline

To meet the cancellation deadline, kindly notify us of your decision to cancel your order before the 14-day cancellation period expires. You can contact us via email or phone to initiate the cancellation process.

Returning Goods

If you decide to cancel your order, you are responsible for taking reasonable care of the goods while they are in your possession. To complete the return process, send the goods back to our contact address at your own expense. Exceptions apply if we delivered the item in error, or if the item is damaged or defective.

Cost of Recovery

In case the returned goods are not received within the specified conditions, we reserve the right to charge you for the direct costs incurred in recovering the goods.

Refunds

Once you have notified us of your decision to cancel the order, any payments made will be promptly refunded to you. You can expect the refund to be processed within 14 days of your cancellation.

Items Not Eligible for Cancellation or Return

Certain goods and services are exempt from the right to cancel, including prescription medicines, personalized goods, rapidly perishable items, and more. Please refer to our policy for a comprehensive list of non-cancelable and non-returnable items.

Forfeiture of Cancellation Right

Your right to cancel may be forfeited if you unseal goods that are not suitable for return due to hygiene or health reasons, unseal sealed audio/video recordings or software, or combine goods with other items to make them inseparable.

At Record Corner, we value your satisfaction and aim to make your shopping experience as smooth as possible. Our Returns and Cancellation Policy ensures transparency and fairness in all interactions. If you have any questions or concerns about cancelling an order or returning goods, our dedicated customer service team is here to assist you.

Please note that specific regulations and details may vary based on your location and the applicable laws. For a detailed understanding of our policy and your rights, we recommend reviewing our complete Returns and Cancellation Policy or contacting our customer service representatives.

CONTACT US

Remember that your satisfaction is our priority, and we are here to help you at every step of the way.
